summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 FORD CMAX EQUIPPED WITH A YAZAKI 120V CONVENIENCE CHARGE CORD PLUG. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 18V592000 (EQUIPMENT); HOWEVER, THE PART NEEDED FOR THE REPAIR WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE CONTACT CALLED PALMETTO FORD LINCOLN AT (843) 571-3673 (LOCATED AT 1625 SAVANNAH HWY, CHARLESTON, SC 29407) AND WAS INFORMED THAT THE PART WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE. THE SERIAL AND PART NUMBERS WERE UNKNOWN. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE.
